What does social-media induced loneliness mean?
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: Social anxiety is an anxiety problem where a person has an excessive and unreasonable fear of social situations. ... There's no shortage of evidence thatloneliness, social anxiety and social isolation can cause excessive use of social networking sites in young people.
